00085 class StringReader {
00086   var $_pos;
00087   var $_str;
00088 
00095   function StringReader($str='') {
00096     $this->_str = $str;
00097     $this->_pos = 0;
00098   }
00099 
00106   function read($bytes) {
00107     $data = substr($this->_str, $this->_pos, $bytes);
00108     $this->_pos += $bytes;
00109     if (strlen($this->_str)<$this->_pos)
00110       $this->_pos = strlen($this->_str);
00111 
00112     return $data;
00113   }
00114 
00121   function seekto($pos) {
00122     $this->_pos = $pos;
00123     if (strlen($this->_str)<$this->_pos)
00124       $this->_pos = strlen($this->_str);
00125     return $this->_pos;
00126   }
00127 
00133   function currentpos() {
00134     return $this->_pos;
00135   }
00136 
00142   function length() {
00143     return strlen($this->_str);
00144   }
00145 
00146 }
00147 
00148 
00157 class FileReader {
00158   var $_pos;
00159   var $_fd;
00160   var $_length;
00161 
00168   function FileReader($filename) {
00169     if (file_exists($filename)) {
00170 
00171       $this->_length=filesize($filename);
00172       $this->_pos = 0;
00173       $this->_fd = fopen($filename,'rb');
00174       if (!$this->_fd) {
00175     $this->error = 3; // Cannot read file, probably permissions
00176     return false;
00177       }
00178     } else {
00179       $this->error = 2; // File doesn't exist
00180       return false;
00181     }
00182   }
00183 
00190   function read($bytes) {
00191     if ($bytes) {
00192       fseek($this->_fd, $this->_pos);
00193       $data = null;
00194       // PHP 5.1.1 does not read more than 8192 bytes in one fread()
00195       // the discussions at PHP Bugs suggest it's the intended behaviour
00196       while ($bytes > 0) {
00197         $chunk  = fread($this->_fd, $bytes);
00198         $data  .= $chunk;
00199         $bytes -= strlen($chunk);
00200       }
00201       $this->_pos = ftell($this->_fd);
00202 
00203       return $data;
00204     } else return '';
00205   }
00206 
00213   function seekto($pos) {
00214     fseek($this->_fd, $pos);
00215     $this->_pos = ftell($this->_fd);
00216     return $this->_pos;
00217   }
00218 
00224   function currentpos() {
00225     return $this->_pos;
00226   }
00227 
00233   function length() {
00234     return $this->_length;
00235   }
00236 
00242   function close() {
00243     fclose($this->_fd);
00244   }
00245 
00246 }
00247

00258 class CachedFileReader extends StringReader {
00265   function CachedFileReader($filename) {
00266     if (file_exists($filename)) {
00267 
00268       $length=filesize($filename);
00269       $fd = fopen($filename,'rb');
00270 
00271       if (!$fd) {
00272     $this->error = 3; // Cannot read file, probably permissions
00273     return false;
00274       }
00275       $this->_str = fread($fd, $length);
00276       fclose($fd);
00277 
00278     } else {
00279       $this->error = 2; // File doesn't exist
00280       return false;
00281     }
00282   }
00283 }
